attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Will the prime minister agree that treating someone differently, in law or in any other walk of life, purely because of the colour of their skin is racist, and will he therefore sack the member of his cabinet and withdraw the whip from her for her proposal to enact racist legislation, that would do the BNP proud ?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
